attributes.action: Make Sony sell their Playstion 3 console for the same price as it is sold in the United States of America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sony Playstion 3 is on sale From the 23rd of March 2007, it will be priced at £425, this is £120 more than it is sold for in America, i find this to be unfair and should be made illegal, There is no reason why Sony should be allowed to sell this piece of equipment at such a higer price in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
